body.h1: WSO2 Business Process Server (BPS) Documentation Index
body.p: Quick Start Guide : Creates a simple BPEL process and deploy it in WSO2 BPS server.
Installation Guide : Gives basic steps on how to download, install, and run WSO2 BPS using the binary distribution, and how to build WSO2 BPS using the source distribution.
Configuring External Data Sources: Gives steps on how to configure WSO2 BPS with database servers like MS SQL and Oracle.
User Guide : A manual on how to run and configure the WSO2 BPS through the management console.

The WSO2 Oxygen Tank Library
: The Library contains articles, tutorials, presentations, and other knowledge base items published on The Oxygen Tank.
